name: Burn (itch) (MyFarms Game Jam II)
description:
This game was a submission to the MyFarms Game Jam II - Feb 2014

Entry by Kelly Johnson

(Note: This entry takes a while to load.  Please be patient!)

Burn

Useful items are hidden in various places. Find the items you need to find the other items you need...etc. Then escape out the trapdoor.

Use WASD to move and click on items to use them when needed.

Things are hidden. Find them. Else you die of malnutrition. Seriously.

Note: There is music. Sometimes it decides not to work. Try playing the game in Google Chrome.
